p: Results of percent AChE and BChE activity in frontal cortex and hippocampus of different animal groups in NORT are given in Figure 6C,D and Figure 7C,D. Percent AChE and BChE activities in the cortex and hippocampus of scopolamine-treated groups were significantly ( p < 0.001 ***) higher than that of the normal saline group. %AChE and BChE activities in the cortex and hippocampus of Fa.EtAc + Scop (100 mg/kg, p.o.) and Fa.EtAc + Scop (200 mg/kg, p.o.)-treated groups, and standard DZP + Scop (20 mg/kg; (i.p.)-treated groups were significantly ( p < 0.01) ##; lower as compared to scopolamine-treated group.
